ChannelIndex: Index of channel in file to build WaveTable from (wraps if channel is greater than number in file)
SourceData: Source data last imported from the source file
Phase: Percent to phase shift of table
Top: Percent to remove from beginning of sampled WaveTable.
Tail: Percent to remove from end of sampled WaveTable.
bNormalize: Whether or not to normalize the WaveTable.
bRemoveOffset:
Whether or not to remove offset from original file
(analogous to "DC offset" in circuit theory).
